data.text: @robscotingram Are you watching the waste water numbers? They’re headed up in southern section. https://t.co/3w0yV8lCPg

@cotter_dave @bensimmoneau One thing I noticed is that death rate per 100k is a lot higher in lower vaccinated counties  including Hampden and Bristol  vs say Suffolk and Middlesex. Some communities are likely accounting for a lot of the slower decline in deaths.
@cindymclennan @bensimmoneau Right. The trend line with the 3 week lag doesn’t seem to be matching up right now.
@bensimmoneau When do you think the deaths will show a significant decline? Daily avg still 27 (.39 per 100k). Were under 10 deaths per day avg from May 8 - Sept 11.

@bensimmoneau Low level of virus safely adding to broad community immunity daily

(log scale, Boston Wastewater, endemic) https://t.co/yFG3IsVO9t
@bensimmoneau Waste water (south) headed back up…. https://t.co/d0zvbPeYS0
